base.html.title: base
base.html.contents: body scss body { margin: 0; padding: 0; font-family: Helvitica, Arial, FreeSans, sans-serif; } Sets default body styles. Author: James Stanger h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 scss h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 { color: $theme-black; } Sets default header styles. Author: James Stanger h1 scss h1 { font-size: 50px; text-shadow: 1px 1px 0 $theme-white; font-family: arial $theme-black, arial, sans-serif; } Sets default heading 1 styles. Author: James Stanger h2 scss h2 { font-size: 23px; } Sets default heading 2 styles. Author: James Stanger h3 scss h3 { font-size: 21px; } Sets default heading 3 styles. Author: James Stanger h4 scss h4 { font-size: 19px; } Sets default heading 4 styles. Author: James Stanger h5 scss h5 { font-size: 17px; } Sets default heading 5 styles. Author: James Stanger h6 scss h6 { font-size: 15px; } Sets default heading 6 styles. Author: James Stanger article, aside, dialog, figure, footer, header, hgroup, menu, nav, section scss article, aside, dialog, figure, footer, header, hgroup, menu, nav, section { display: block; } Sets default section styles. Author: James Stanger

bit-buttons.html.title: bit-buttons
bit-buttons.html.contents: .bit-btn scss .bit-btn { border-radius: 5px; padding: 0 3px; min-height: 35px; min-width: 60px; background: $theme-main--deep; border: none; color: $theme-white; box-sizing: content-box; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; } Sets base styles for a button. Author: James Stanger Example html <button class="bit-btn">Click</button> Requires $theme-main--deep (Color) $theme-white (Color) .bit-btn-clickable scss .bit-btn-clickable { @include clickable; } Styles clickable button animation. *Note: This is NOT necessary on elements such as bit-btn-search, bit-btn-add, etc. These already have the functionality built in. Author: James Stanger Example html <button type="button" class="bit-btn bit-btn-clickable">Click</button> Requires @mixin clickable() .bit-btn-search scss .bit-btn-search { @include clickable; &:before { @include icon; @include icon-url('search') } } Styles a search button. Author: James Stanger Example html <button type="button" class="bit-btn bit-btn-search">Search</button> Requires @mixin clickable() @mixin icon() @mixin icon-url() .bit-btn-add scss .bit-btn-add { @include clickable; line-height: 35px; display: inline-block; &:before { @include icon("+"); font-weight: bolder; } } Styles an add button. Author: James Stanger Example html <button type="button" class="bit-btn bit-btn-add">Add</button> Requires @mixin clickable() @mixin icon() .bit-btn-reset scss .bit-btn-reset { @include clickable; &:before { @include icon; @include icon-url('reset'); } } Styles a reset button. Author: James Stanger Example html <button type="button" class="bit-btn bit-btn-reset">Reset</button> Requires @mixin clickable() @mixin icon() @mixin icon-url() .bit-btn-expand scss .bit-btn-expand { @include bit-btn-noBackground; @include clickable-shadowless; line-height: 1.6; &:after { @include icon("+"); font-size: 15px; font-weight: 900; width: 1.8em; height: 1.8em; text-align: center; border-radius: 1em; background: $theme-secondary--deep; } } Styles an expand button. Author: James Stanger Example html <button type="button" class="bit-btn bit-btn-expand"></button> Requires @mixin bit-btn-noBackground() @mixin clickable-shadowless() @mixin icon() $theme-secondary--deep (Color) .bit-btn-exit scss .bit-btn-exit { @include clickable; &:before { @include icon(); @include icon-url('exit'); } } Styles an exit button. Author: James Stanger Example html <button type="button" class="bit-btn bit-btn-exit"></button> Requires @mixin clickable() @mixin icon() @mixin icon-url()

bit-drop-list.html.title: bit-drop-list
bit-drop-list.html.contents:
.bit-dropList scss .bit-dropList { /* display beneath parent. Hide by default. Set to outer z-index layer. */ position: absolute; padding: 0; display: none; width: inherit; margin-top: 3px; z-index: $level-9; list-style: none; left: 0; right: 0; background: darken($theme-generic, 5%); } Sets an sublist to display beneath its parent. Will show only on hover. *Note: This component will be hidden by default, and is triggered when a parent list is hovered over. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% include 'bit-dropList.njk' %} html compiled
    Requires $theme-generic (Color) $level-9 (Number) .bit-dropList--item scss .bit-dropList--item { /* ensure children are not transparent */ padding: 3px 0; box-shadow: $theme-black 0 0 1px inset; &:hover { transition: border-top-width 100ms; border-top: 2px groove $theme-secondary--light; } & > .bit-link { color: $theme-black; } } Styles an item contained within a dropList component. Author: James Stanger Example markup
  • Example
    • Requires $theme-black (Color) $theme-secondary--light (Color)

bit-icons.html.title: bit-icons
bit-icons.html.contents: .bit-icon-user scss .bit-icon-user { &:after { @include icon; @include icon-url('user', 20px, 20px); } } Inserts a user / profile icon after the element. Author: James Stanger Example html Requires @mixin icon() @mixin icon-url() .bit-icon-sort scss .bit-icon-sort { display: inline-block; &:after { margin-left: 3px; @include icon; @include icon-url('sort', 15px, 15px); } } Inserts a sort icon after the element. Author: James Stanger Example html Requires @mixin icon() @mixin icon-url() .bit-icon-error scss .bit-icon-error { &:after { @include icon('!'); color: red; } } Indicates that the icon requested was not found. Used primarily in JavaScript. Author: James Stanger Example html Requires @mixin icon() .bit-icon-details scss .bit-icon-details { &:after { @include icon; @include icon-url('details', 20px, 20px); margin-right: 0; } } Inserts a details icon after the element. Author: James Stanger Example html Requires @mixin icon() @mixin icon-url() .bit-icon-delete scss .bit-icon-delete { &:after { @include icon(); @include icon-url('delete', 20px, 20px); } } Inserts a delete icon after the element. Author: James Stanger Example html Requires @mixin icon() @mixin icon-url() .bit-icon-edit scss .bit-icon-edit { &:after { @include icon; @include icon-url('edit', 20px, 20px); } } Inserts an edit icon after the element. Author: James Stanger Example html Requires @mixin icon() @mixin icon-url() .bit-icon-back scss .bit-icon-back { &:after { @include icon; @include icon-url('back', 25px, 25px); } } Inserts a back arrow icon after the element. Author: James Stanger Example html Requires @mixin icon() @mixin icon-url() .bit-icon-calendar scss .bit-icon-calendar { &:after { @include icon; @include icon-url('calendar', 20px, 20px); } } Inserts a calendar icon after the element. Author: James Stanger Example html Requires @mixin icon() @mixin icon-url() .bit-icon-search scss .bit-icon-search { padding: 0; background: none; border: none; &:before { @include icon; @include icon-url('search-black', 25px, 25px); } } Inserts a search icon before the element. Author: James Stanger Example html Requires @mixin icon() @mixin icon-url() .bit-icon-exit scss .bit-icon-exit { padding: 0; background: none; border: none; &:before { @include icon(); @include icon-url('exit-black', 20px, 20px); } } Inserts an exit icon before the element. Author: James Stanger Example html Requires @mixin icon() @mixin icon-url()

bit-input.html.title: bit-input
bit-input.html.contents:
.bit-input scss .bit-input { display: flex; align-items: center; @media screen and (max-width: $break-xs) { @include stack-input(); } } Defines a container used to horizontally layout an input field and label in a uniformed way. *Note: will change to vertical orientation on small screen. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% set key = 'Name' %} {% set value = 'James' %} {% set type = 'text' %} {% include 'bit-input.njk' %} html compiled
Requires @mixin stack-input() $break-xs (Number) .bit-input-stacked scss .bit-input-stacked { @include stack-input(); } Defines a container used to vertically layout an input field and label in a uniformed way. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% set key = 'Name' %} {% set value = 'James' %} {% set type = 'text' %} {% set inputClass = 'bit-input-stacked' %} {% include 'bit-input.njk' %} html compiled
Requires @mixin stack-input() .bit-input--label scss .bit-input--label { margin: 5px 10px 5px 0; display: inline-block; flex: 0 125px; } Styles an input label. Author: James Stanger Example html .bit-input--field scss .bit-input--field { padding: 5px; &:not([type = checkbox]) { /* Select inputs that are not checkboxes. */ border: none; box-shadow: inset 1px 1px 4px $theme-black; border-radius: 3px; min-height: 30px; flex: 1; width: 100%; } &[type = number] { max-width: 50px; } &[readonly] { background: lighten($theme-generic, 5%); } &:focus { box-shadow: 0 0 5px $theme-main--dark inset; border: 1px solid $theme-secondary; } } Styles an input field. *Note: checkbox, number, and other fields may be styled differently. Author: James Stanger Examples html html html Requires $theme-black (Color) $theme-generic (Color) $theme-main--dark (Color) $theme-secondary .bit-input--date scss .bit-input--date, .bit-input--date[readonly] { background: url($img-directory + '/calendar.svg') 5px / 20px 20px no-repeat; padding-left: 40px; } Styles only the outside of an input datepicker. The datepicker itself will be handled elsewhere. *Note: This can be a native datepicker, user-defined datepicker, or third-party component. Author: James Stanger Example html Requires $img-directory (String) .bit-input--required scss .bit-input--required:before { @include icon('*'); padding: 5px; color: red; } Adds an indicator before the element that the field is required. *NOTE: this class should be applied to the label of the input, as input elements do not allow pseudo elements in all browsers. Author: James Stanger Example html Requires @mixin icon()

bit-link.html.title: bit-link
bit-link.html.contents: .bit-link scss .bit-link { text-decoration: none; color: darken($theme-generic, 40%); transition: color 300ms ease-in-out; display: inline-block; width: 100%; &:hover { color: $theme-link; } } Sets base styles for a link and defines hover transitions. Author: James Stanger Example html Click Requires $theme-generic (Color) $theme-link (Color)

bit-loading.html.title: bit-loading
bit-loading.html.contents: .bit-loading scss .bit-loading { @include icon-url('loading', 35px, 35px); display: inline-block; animation-name: spin; animation-duration: 2000ms; animation-iteration-count: infinite; animation-timing-function: linear; } Defines simple animated loading spinner. Author: James Stanger Example html Requires @mixin icon-url()

block-action-container.html.title: block-action-container
block-action-container.html.contents: .block-actionContainer scss .block-actionContainer { height: 35px; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; & > [class*=bit-icon] { padding: 3px; } } Container that holds action items in a table cell. Author: James Stanger Example html

block-multi-select.html.title: block-multi-select
block-multi-select.html.contents:
.block-multiSelect scss .block-multiSelect { display: flex; align-items: center; @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { flex-direction: column; align-items: stretch; } } Defines a container that will layout the label and select elements horizontally. *Note: The element will be vertical-aligned on small screens. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% set type = 'multiSelect' %} {% include 'block-multiSelect.njk' %} html compiled
.block-multiSelect-stacked scss .block-multiSelect-stacked { display: flex; flex-direction: column; } Defines a container that will layout the label and select elements vertically. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% set type = 'multiSelect-stacked' %} {% include 'block-multiSelect.njk' %} html compiled
.block-multiSelect--label scss .block-multiSelect--label { margin: 5px 10px; } Styles a multi-select label. Author: James Stanger Example html Related .block-multiSelect .block-multiSelect--select scss .block-multiSelect--select { margin: 5px 10px; padding: 2px; border-radius: 5px; box-shadow: 2px 2px 3px $theme-generic; } Styles the actual select element in block-multiSelect. Author: James Stanger Example html Related .block-multiSelect

block-nav-list.html.title: block-nav-list
block-nav-list.html.contents:
.block-navList scss .block-navList { } Defines a container that will hold the responsive navigation list and the mobile-oriented expand button. *Note: This selector may not contain any styles, but it is used to target the list by parent components and by JavaScript. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% include 'block-navList.njk' %} html compiled
  • Home
  • People
  • More
    • Be a Trooper
    • Media
  • Links
    • breathtest
    • wsp.wa.gov
    • Google
  • Contact
.block-navList--list scss .block-navList--list { display: flex; flex-direction: row; background: lighten($theme-main--dark, 20%); margin: 0; padding-left: 0; z-index: $level-9; @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { /* mobile list style */ /* hide by default */ display: block; /* Translate nav list the width of the nav minus an extra 50px to be just off of the left side of the screen */ $listWidth: 100%; width: $listWidth; transform: translateX(-$listWidth - 50); transition: transform 600ms ease-in-out; position: absolute; left: 0; /* show when nav-show class is applied and only on medium screen */ &.nav-show { display: flex; flex-direction: column; transform: none; } } } Styles the responsive navigation list. Author: James Stanger Example html
  • Home
  • Main
  • Contact
Requires $theme-main--dark (Color) $level-9 (Number) $break-med (Number) .block-navList--item scss .block-navList--item { list-style: none; box-shadow: 0 0 1px inset; padding: 3px 0; text-align: center; position: relative; flex: 1 auto; &:hover { /* apply transitions and border only when not mobile. */ transition: border-top-width 100ms; border-top: 2px groove $theme-secondary--deep; margin-top: -2px; .bit-dropList { /* show any sublists on hover */ display: block; } } @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { /* resize list items on mobile */ padding: 5px; position: relative; &:hover { border: none; margin: 0; } } } Styles an item in the navigation list. Author: James Stanger Example html
  • Home
Requires $theme-secondary--deep (Color) $break-med (Number) .block-navList--sublistHeading scss .block-navList--sublistHeading { &:after { content: "▾"; margin-left: 4px; } } Places drop-down symbol after the element. *Note: this should be applied to the element directly before a bit-dropList in a block-navList. Author: James Stanger Example html
  • Home
.block-navList--expand scss .block-navList--expand { /* hide by default */ display: none; /* style expand button when screen is small */ @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; border: 2px solid $theme-secondary--light; border-radius: 10px; width: 50px; height: 50px; } } Styles an expand button to expand the navigation on small screens. *Note: The expand button will only appear on small screens. Author: James Stanger Example html
Requires $theme-secondary--light (Color) $break-med (Number) .block-navList--expandLine scss .block-navList--expandLine { width: 60%; margin: 4px; border: 2px solid $theme-black; } Styles a line of the block-navList–expand button. Author: James Stanger Requires $theme-black (Color)

configuration.html.title: configuration
configuration.html.contents: $img-directory (String) scss $img-directory: '../assets'; Global Images Folder Path *NOTE: This should be relative to the location the compiled css file will live. Author: James Stanger Used By .bit-input--date @mixin icon-url() @mixin drop-arrow() $theme-white (Color) scss $theme-white: #f9f9f9; Theme White Author: James Stanger Used By .bit-btn $theme-main (Color) scss $theme-main: #a1bae1; Main Theme Color *NOTE: the main color should be relatively light in order for theming to work correctly. Valid examples include: #ace1cb, #e1adb0, #ddb9e1, #a8aae1, #a1bae1, #a6d1e1. Author: James Stanger Used By .smart-accordion--toggle .smart-nav $theme-main--dark (Color) scss $theme-main--dark: darken($theme-main, 55%); Main Color Dark Author: James Stanger Used By .bit-input--field .block-navList--list @mixin apply-gradient() $theme-main--deep (Color) scss $theme-main--deep: darken($theme-main, 30%); Main Color Deep Author: James Stanger Used By .bit-btn $theme-main--light (Color) scss $theme-main--light: lighten($theme-main, 10%); Main Color Light Author: James Stanger Used By @mixin apply-gradient() .smart-table--row $theme-link (Color) scss $theme-link: #0063ff; Link Theme Color Author: James Stanger Used By .bit-link $theme-secondary scss $theme-secondary: #fea104; Secondary Theme Color *Note: this color is more flexible than the first because it is used less frequently. It should still be a brighter color. Author: James Stanger Used By .bit-input--field $theme-secondary--light (Color) scss $theme-secondary--light: lighten($theme-secondary, 10%); Secondary Color Light Author: James Stanger Used By .bit-dropList--item .block-navList--expand $theme-secondary--deep (Color) scss $theme-secondary--deep: saturate($theme-secondary, 20%); Secondary Color Deep Author: James Stanger Used By .bit-btn-expand .block-navList--item .smart-nav $theme-black (Color) scss $theme-black: #0d0908; Black Theme Color Author: James Stanger Used By .bit-dropList--item .bit-input--field .block-navList--expandLine @mixin clickable() .smart-details-outlined .smart-details--header .smart-modal .smart-modal--close .smart-table--heading .smart-table--cell .smart-table--link .record-is-expanded $theme-generic (Color) scss $theme-generic: #d9d9d9; Generic Theme Color Author: James Stanger Used By .bit-dropList .bit-input--field .bit-link .smart-accordion--toggle .smart-accordion--content .smart-details--header .smart-form--titleSection .smart-modal--head .smart-modal--close .smart-modal--footer .smart-search .smart-table--head .smart-tabs--tab .smart-tabs--content .smart-tabs--activeTab

index.html.title: Smart-X-Styles Documentation
index.html.contents: Smart-X (SASS) A responsive UI component library built with SASS, complete with interactive documentation and build tools. Getting Started Clone repository git clone https://github.com/stangerjm/smart-x-sass.git Move into newly cloned repo cd smart-x-sass Install dependencies npm install Compile CSS and build documentation npm run build Run smart-x-sass/sassdoc/index.html for documentation. Copy smart-x-sass/dist/styles.css or smart-x-sass/dist/styles.min.css and include in your project! Authors James Stanger - Developer License This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the LICENSE.md file for details Acknowledgments Build tool: Gulp Documentation generated by SassDoc and Herman

layout.html.title: layout
layout.html.contents: .layout-container-icons scss .layout-container-icons { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; width: 100px; padding: 10px; } Defines a small container for formatting icons Author: James Stanger .layout-grid scss .layout-grid { display: grid; height: 100vh; } Defines a grid container Author: James Stanger .layout-main scss .layout-main { /* Grid representation: 1 2 1 +--------------------+ | NAV - auto | 2 +--------------------+ | SEARCH - auto | 3 +--------------------+ | | | CONTENT - fill | | | 4 +--------------------+ | FOOTER - 50px | 5 +--------------------+ */ grid-template: "nav " auto "search " auto "content" 1fr "footer " 50px / 1fr; } Grid layout for browsers that support CSS Grid *Note, there is an undocumented fallback for other browsers Author: James Stanger .layout-main--nav scss .layout-main--nav { grid-area: nav; min-height: auto; } Defines a nav area Author: James Stanger .layout-main--search scss .layout-main--search { grid-area: search; } Defines a search area Author: James Stanger .layout-main--content scss .layout-main--content { grid-area: content; } Defines a content area Author: James Stanger .layout-main--footer scss .layout-main--footer { grid-area: footer; } Defines a footer area Author: James Stanger .layout-subsection scss .layout-subsection { display: flex; flex-direction: column; height: 100%; } Defines a subsection to layout a child of another layout container Author: James Stanger Example markup <main class="layout-main--content"> <section class="layout-subsection"> <header class="layout-subsection--header">...</header> <main class="layout-subsection--main">...</main> <footer class="layout-subsection--footer">...</footer> </section> </main> .layout-subsection--header scss .layout-subsection--header { flex: 0 auto; } Defines a header subsection container Author: James Stanger .layout-subsection--main scss .layout-subsection--main { flex: 1 0 auto; } Defines a main subsection container Author: James Stanger .layout-subsection--footer scss .layout-subsection--footer { flex: 1 0 auto; margin-top: 10px; } Defines a footer subsection container Author: James Stanger

mixins.html.title: mixins
mixins.html.contents: @mixin hide() Mixin to hide element. Author: James Stanger Used By .smart-table--heading .smart-table--cell .smart-table--expand @mixin icon-url() Mixin to include an image in an icon element. Author: James Stanger Parameters $iconName: (String) Name of the icon file. $width: 15px (Number) Width of the icon. $height: 15px (Number) Height of the icon. Example scss Basic use .user-icon { @include icon-url("user", 13px); } css compiled .user-icon { background: url("../assets/user.svg") no-repeat; width: 13px; height: 15px; } Requires $img-directory (String) Used By .bit-btn-search .bit-btn-reset .bit-btn-exit .bit-icon-user .bit-icon-sort .bit-icon-details .bit-icon-delete .bit-icon-edit .bit-icon-back .bit-icon-calendar .bit-icon-search .bit-icon-exit .bit-loading .smart-nav--logo @mixin icon() Sets base styles for an icon. Optionally will include a character as the icon. Author: James Stanger Parameters $content: " " (String) Optional character to use as icon. Examples scss Basic use .icon { @include icon(); } css compiled .icon { content: " "; display: inline-block; } scss Include a character as an icon .icon { @include icon("*"); } css compiled .icon { content: "*"; display: inline-block; } Used By .bit-btn-search .bit-btn-add .bit-btn-reset .bit-btn-expand .bit-btn-exit .bit-icon-user .bit-icon-sort .bit-icon-error .bit-icon-details .bit-icon-delete .bit-icon-edit .bit-icon-back .bit-icon-calendar .bit-icon-search .bit-icon-exit .bit-input--required @mixin drop-arrow() Sets a drop-arrow icon to the very right of an element Author: James Stanger Parameters $position: (Number) background position. $size: (Number) size of the arrow. $top: 17px (Number) top absolute position value. Requires $img-directory (String) @mixin clickable() Styles a button to have a click animation. Author: James Stanger Example scss Basic use .clickable-btn { @include clickable; } css compiled .clickable-btn { box-shadow: 2px 1px 1px #0d0908; } .clickable-btn:active { box-shadow: 1px 1px 0; transform: translate(2px, 2px); } Requires $theme-black (Color) Used By .bit-btn-clickable .bit-btn-search .bit-btn-add .bit-btn-reset .bit-btn-exit @mixin clickable-shadowless() Styles a button to have a basic click animation with no shadow. Author: James Stanger Example scss Basic use .clear-btn { @include clickable-shadowless; } css compiled .clear-btn:active { transform: translate(2px, 2px); } Used By .bit-btn-expand @mixin bit-btn-noBackground() Removes background of a button. Author: James Stanger Used By .bit-btn-expand @mixin stack-input() Stacks bit-input component Author: James Stanger Used By .bit-input .bit-input-stacked @mixin apply-gradient() Applies a linear-gradient in the direction specified. Author: James Stanger Parameters $direction: (String) direction gradient should be applied in. Requires $theme-main--dark (Color) $theme-main--light (Color) Used By .smart-nav

smart-accordion.html.title: smart-accordion
smart-accordion.html.contents:
.smart-accordion scss .smart-accordion { width: 100%; } Defines a responsive accordion. *NOTE: As of now, these styles are only to support the Vue.js implementation of the Smart-Accordion. This component will not work in the example below or in the vanilla version of this framework. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% include 'smart-accordion.njk' %} html compiled

Demo!

.smart-accordion--toggle scss .smart-accordion--toggle { padding: 5px 20px; position: relative; z-index: 20; display: block; cursor: pointer; min-height: 50px; width: 100%; background: $theme-generic; border: none; text-align: left; &:hover { background: lighten($theme-generic, 5%); &:after { /* Only apply drop-arrow on hover */ @include drop-arrow(-11px, 15px); } } &.is-expanded { /* Styles for expanded smart-accordion */ background: saturate($theme-main, 10%); &:hover { &:after { /* Only apply drop-arrow on hover */ @include drop-arrow(10px, 15px, 10px); } } } } Styles the toggle button for the accordion. Author: James Stanger Examples html Not expanded html Expanded Requires $theme-generic (Color) $theme-main (Color) .smart-accordion--content scss .smart-accordion--content { overflow: hidden; height: 0; position: relative; z-index: 10; transition: height 500ms ease-in-out; background: lighten($theme-generic, 10%); box-shadow: 0 0 2px 0 inset; > * { /* Immediate children of smart-accordion--content should not have a margin so content can be resized properly. */ margin: 0; } } Styles the toggle button for the accordion. Author: James Stanger Example markup

Demo!

Requires $theme-generic (Color)

smart-details.html.title: smart-details
smart-details.html.contents:
.smart-details scss .smart-details { } Defines a container that will layout details in a uniform way. *Note: This selector may not contain any styles, but it is used to target the list by parent components and by JavaScript. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% set detailsClass = 'smart-details' %} {% include 'smart-details.njk' %} html compiled

.smart-details-outlined scss .smart-details-outlined { border: 1px solid $theme-black; border-radius: 5px; } Defines an outlined container that will layout details in a uniform way. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% set detailsClass = 'smart-details-outlined' %} {% include 'smart-details.njk' %} html compiled

Details

Requires $theme-black (Color) .smart-details--headerLayout scss .smart-details--headerLayout { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; @media screen and (max-width: $break-sml) { flex-direction: column; } } Optional layout for the header if more than just the title is desired. Author: James Stanger Example html

Title

Requires $break-sml (Number) .smart-details--header scss .smart-details--header { border-radius: 5px 5px 0 0; border-bottom: 1px solid $theme-black; background: $theme-generic; } Styles the header of the details container. Author: James Stanger Example html

Details

Requires $theme-black (Color) $theme-generic (Color) .smart-details--heading scss .smart-details--heading { padding: 10px; margin: 0; } Ensures that the heading of the details container is positioned properly. Author: James Stanger Example html

Details

.smart-details--listContainer scss .smart-details--listContainer { display: flex; @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { flex-direction: column; } } Defines a container for each column of the details element to layout evenly. Author: James Stanger Example markup
...
...
Requires $break-med (Number) .smart-details--list scss .smart-details--list { margin: 0; width: 100%; } Defines a container for each detail to layout in a column. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% set detailItems = [ { Name: "James", Age: 24, Student: false, Position: 'ITS3', MoreInfo: 'more', AnotherProp: 'another'}, { MoreAbout: 'About me', test1: 'test', test2: 'test2', test3: 'test3' } ] %} {% include 'smart-details.njk' %} html compiled

.smart-details--detail scss .smart-details--detail { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; padding: 5px; @media screen and (max-width: $break-xs) { font-size: 0.75em; overflow-wrap: break-word; } } Defines a container to layout the detail key and value side-by-side. Author: James Stanger Example html
Name
James
Related A DIV element is allowed under a DL element as per the W3 specification. [external] Requires $break-xs (Number) .smart-details--detailKey, .smart-details--detailValue scss .smart-details--detailKey, .smart-details--detailValue { width: 50%; margin: 0; padding: 0 10px; box-sizing: border-box; } Styles both the key and value of a detail to be spaced evenly, from side-to-side. Author: James Stanger Related .smart-details--detail .smart-details--detailValue scss .smart-details--detailValue { text-align: left; } Styles a detail value Author: James Stanger Related .smart-details--detail .smart-details--detailKey scss .smart-details--detailKey { text-align: right; font-weight: bolder; } Styles a detail key Author: James Stanger Related .smart-details--detail

smart-footer.html.title: smart-footer
smart-footer.html.contents:
.smart-footer scss .smart-footer { background: $theme-main; font-size: 10px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; } Defines a simple footer. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% include 'footer.njk' %} html compiled

© Washington State Patrol

07/26/2018

smart-form.html.title: smart-form
smart-form.html.contents:
.smart-form scss .smart-form { } Defines a container that will layout form inputs in a uniform way. *Note: This selector may not contain any styles, but it is used to target the list by parent components and by JavaScript. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% include 'smart-form.njk' %} html compiled

Edit

.smart-form--titleSection scss .smart-form--titleSection { background: $theme-generic; padding: 10px 5px; } Defines a container that will layout the title of the form. Author: James Stanger Example html

Edit

Requires $theme-generic (Color) .smart-form--title scss .smart-form--title { margin: 0; } Styles the title of the form. Author: James Stanger Example html

Edit

.smart-form--fieldSection scss .smart-form--fieldSection { padding: 5px; } Defines a container that ensures the fields layout correctly. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% set key = 'Name' %} {% set value = 'James' %} {% set type = 'text' %} {% set inputClass = 'bit-input-stacked' %}
{% include 'bit-input.njk' %}
html compiled
.smart-form--field scss .smart-form--field { margin: 10px 0; } Defines layout for a single field in the form. *Note: ideally, this would also be combined with the bit-input component. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% set key = 'Name' %} {% set value = 'James' %} {% set type = 'text' %} {% set inputClass = 'smart-form--field bit-input-stacked' %}
{% include 'bit-input.njk' %}
html compiled

smart-modal.html.title: smart-modal
smart-modal.html.contents:
.smart-modal scss .smart-modal { /* Hide by default */ display: none; position: fixed; z-index: $level-100; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; overflow: auto; /* fallback color */ background-color: $theme-black; background-color: rgba($theme-black, 0.5); } Defines an overlay container that will deny access to the UI while the modal is open. *Note: this component is hidden by default. The example below is displayed by default for demonstration purposes only. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% include 'smart-modal.njk' %} html compiled

My Modal

Your content goes here!

Requires $level-100 (Number) $theme-black (Color) .smart-modal--content scss .smart-modal--content { position: fixed; background: white; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); width: 600px; max-height: 95vh; overflow: auto; @media screen and (max-width: 820px) { width: 80%; } } Defines a sub-container that will center the modal in the middle of the overlay. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% include 'smart-modal.njk' %} html compiled

My Modal

Your content goes here!

.smart-modal--head scss .smart-modal--head { background: $theme-generic; padding: 5px; text-align: right; } Defines a header container for the modal. Author: James Stanger Example html

My Modal

Requires $theme-generic (Color) .smart-modal--close scss .smart-modal--close:not(.bit-btn) { height: 30px; width: 45px; padding: 0; background: $theme-generic; border: none; box-shadow: $theme-black 0 0 3px 0; border-radius: 5px; } Styles a close button for the modal if button is not also a bit-btn component. Author: James Stanger Example html
Requires $theme-black (Color) $theme-generic (Color) .smart-modal--title scss .smart-modal--title { font-size: 35px; margin: 5px 0; text-align: center; @media screen and (max-width: 820px) { font-size: 25px; } } Sets styles for the title of the modal Author: James Stanger Example html

My Modal

.smart-modal--warningTitle scss .smart-modal--warningTitle { text-align: center; color: red; } Styles an alternative style for the title indicating some sort of warning Author: James Stanger Example html

My Modal

.smart-modal--body scss .smart-modal--body { position: static; } Defines the main content container for the modal *Note: this container is essential for any UI that uses absolute or fixed positioning inside the modal. Author: James Stanger Example markup
.smart-modal--footer scss .smart-modal--footer { padding: 5px; display: flex; justify-content: flex-end; align-items: center; background: $theme-generic; } Defines a footer container for the modal Author: James Stanger Example html
Requires $theme-generic (Color) .smart-modal--footerItem scss .smart-modal--footerItem { margin: 0 5px; } Styles a single item in the modal footer Author: James Stanger Related .smart-modal--footer

smart-nav.html.title: smart-nav
smart-nav.html.contents:
.smart-nav scss .smart-nav { border-bottom: 1px solid $theme-secondary--deep; background-color: $theme-main; position: relative; @include apply-gradient(to left); @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { @include apply-gradient(to top); } } Defines a container that will layout the navigation items. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% include 'smart-nav.njk' %} html compiled
JMST225 - 7/27/2018 01:49:31

Requires $theme-secondary--deep (Color) $theme-main (Color) $break-med (Number) @mixin apply-gradient() .smart-nav--header scss .smart-nav--header { display: flex; flex-direction: column; } Defines a header container for the navigation Author: James Stanger Example markup
.smart-nav--headerMain scss .smart-nav--headerMain { display: flex; align-items: center; @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { justify-content: center; } } Defines a main section for the navigation header. Author: James Stanger Example html
Requires $break-med (Number) .smart-nav--title scss .smart-nav--title { margin: 5px; } Styles a title for the navigation Author: James Stanger Example html

Admin Console

.smart-nav--headerAside scss .smart-nav--headerAside { text-align: right; background: rgba(230, 230, 230, 0.7); @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { text-align: center; background: none; } } Defines a container for the secondary section of the navigation header. Author: James Stanger Example html
JMST225 - 7/27/2018 01:49:31
Requires $break-med (Number) .smart-nav--logo scss .smart-nav--logo { margin: 5px 10px; display: block; @include icon-url("wspLogo", 125px, 60px); @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { width: 70px; height: 35px; } } Styles the logo of the navigation Author: James Stanger Example html Requires @mixin icon-url() $break-med (Number) .smart-nav--list scss .smart-nav--list { @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { margin: 10px; } } Defines a container for the navigation list. *Note: ideally, this element should contain a block-navList component. Author: James Stanger Example njk
{% include 'block-navList.njk' %}

Requires $break-med (Number) .smart-nav--userTime scss .smart-nav--userTime { padding: 10px; @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { display: none; } } Defines a simple container for the user / time segment of the navigation header. Author: James Stanger Example markup Requires $break-med (Number) .smart-nav--clock scss .smart-nav--clock { } Defines simple container for the current time to be displayed. *Note: this selector may not contain any styles, but it is used to target this element via JavaScript. Author: James Stanger Example html JMST225 - 7/27/2018 01:49:31

smart-search.html.title: smart-search
smart-search.html.contents:
.smart-search scss .smart-search { background: $theme-generic; } Defines a container that will hold all of the search components. *Note: the state will be toggled by clicking the search button, and will be managed via JavaScript. Author: James Stanger Examples njk {% include 'smart-search.njk' %} html compiled

Search - Collapsed State

njk {% set isExpanded = true %} {% include 'smart-search.njk' %} html compiled

Search - Expanded State

Requires $theme-generic (Color) .smart-search--heading scss .smart-search--heading { display: flex; align-items: center; flex-wrap: wrap; padding-left: 10px; } Defines a container for the header of the smart-search component. Author: James Stanger Example html

Search

.smart-search--title scss .smart-search--title { margin-right: 10px; @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { /* Force other items to next row */ width: 100%; } } Styles the title of a smart-search component. Author: James Stanger Example html

Search

Requires $break-med (Number) .smart-search--action scss .smart-search--action { /* Align action button to the right */ margin: 10px 10px 10px auto; } Styles the action buttons on the smart-search header. Author: James Stanger Example html .smart-search--fieldContainer scss .smart-search--fieldContainer { overflow: hidden; position: relative; transition: min-height 600ms; } Defines a container that will encompass all fields *Note: primary purpose is to hide and position its immediate child: .smart-search–toggleContainer. *Note: the height of this container is dynamically set via JavaScript so that it remains responsive. Author: James Stanger Example markup
...
.smart-search--field scss .smart-search--field { width: 100%; padding: 5px; } Styles a field of the search bar. Serves as a wrapper for the bit-input component. *Note: should be used in combination with .bit-input component. Author: James Stanger Example njk {% set inputClass = 'smart-search--field bit-input' %} {% set key = 'Name' %} {% set type = 'text' %} {% include 'bit-input.njk' %} html compiled
.smart-search--toggleContainer scss .smart-search--toggleContainer { position: absolute; padding: 10px; transition: transform 800ms ease-in-out; box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%; } Defines a container that will slide in and out of view when toggled. *Note: toggle functionality is handled in JavaScript. Author: James Stanger Example markup
.is-hidden scss .is-hidden { min-height: 0; & > .smart-search--toggleContainer { transform: translateY(-800px); } } The class that is applied to smart-search–fieldContainer to hide the toggle container and to toggle the search button *Note: this class is toggled on the smart-search–fieldContainer via JavaScript on click *Note: this should be put on the smart-search–fieldContainer in the markup if it SHOULD NOT be expanded by default. Author: James Stanger

smart-table.html.title: smart-table
smart-table.html.contents:
.smart-table scss .smart-table { width: 100%; border-spacing: 0; border: 1px solid $theme-black; border-collapse: separate; @media screen and (max-width: $break-lrg) { table-layout: fixed; } } Defines a responsive table Author: James Stanger Examples njk {% include 'smart-table.njk' %} html compiled
name age isEmployee
Name: James Age: 24 Employee: true
Name: Jenna Age: 23 Employee: false
njk {% set isExpanded = true %} {% include 'smart-table.njk' %} html compiled
name age isEmployee
Name: James Age: 24 Employee: true
Name: Jenna Age: 23 Employee: false
.smart-table--head scss .smart-table--head { background: darken($theme-generic, 10%); } Defines a container for the table headings Author: James Stanger Example html
Name Age Birthday
Requires $theme-generic (Color) .smart-table--heading scss .smart-table--heading { border: 1px solid $theme-black; text-align: center; @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { @include hide(); } } Styles a table heading element. Author: James Stanger Example html Name Requires $theme-black (Color) $break-med (Number) @mixin hide() .smart-table--inlineHeading scss .smart-table--inlineHeading { display: none; font-weight: bolder; font-size: 1.1em; } Styles a heading in the table cell itself. Will only be shown on small screens. Author: James Stanger Example markup Name: James .smart-table--row scss .smart-table--row { text-align: center; &:nth-child(even) { background: $theme-main--light; } &:not(.smart-table--head):nth-child(odd) { background: white; } @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { &:not(.smart-table--head) { display: flex; align-items: center; padding: 10px 0; /* justify content for IE layout */ justify-content: space-between; } &.record-is-expanded { align-items: stretch; } } } Defines a container to place all TD and TH elements. *Note: this element should most likely be a TR element. Author: James Stanger Example markup Requires $theme-main--light (Color) $break-med (Number) .smart-table--cell scss .smart-table--cell { border: 1px solid $theme-black; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; text-align: left; @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { border: none; &:not(.smart-table--key) { @include hide(); } } } Styles an individual cell of the table Author: James Stanger Example markup Name: James Requires $theme-black (Color) $break-med (Number) @mixin hide() .smart-table--centeredCell scss .smart-table--centeredCell { text-align: center; } Styles a cell to be centered in its own column. Author: James Stanger Example markup DATA .smart-table--key scss .smart-table--key { min-width: 50px; flex: 1; } Styles a cell that should be displayed even when table is in mobile-responsive mode. Author: James Stanger Example html
Name Age
Name: James (I SHOW EVEN ON MOBILE) Age: 23 (I DO NOT)
.smart-table--link scss .smart-table--link { color: $theme-black; &:hover { text-decoration: underline; } } Styles a link to be used in the table headings or elsewhere on the table Author: James Stanger Example html Name Requires $theme-black (Color) .smart-table--expand scss .smart-table--expand { @include hide(); position: relative; right: 0; top: 0; @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { display: block; } } Styles an expand button used on mobile screens to expand a collapsed table cell Author: James Stanger Example markup Related .bit-btn-expand Requires @mixin hide() $break-med (Number) .record-is-expanded scss .record-is-expanded { @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { flex-direction: column; position: relative; .smart-table--cell { text-align: left; border-bottom: 1px solid $theme-black; margin: 5px 0; white-space: normal; overflow: visible; text-overflow: clip; display: block; flex: none; //for IE. Has no effect on Chrome or Firefox float: right; &:first-child { /* Make room for collapse button */ padding: 30px 0 10px 0; } } td:nth-last-of-type(2) { /* Hide last border */ border-bottom: none; } .smart-table--expand { position: absolute; top: 10px; } .bit-btn-expand { &:after { /* Toggle the expand button to a collapse button */ content: "-"; } } .smart-table--inlineHeading { @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { display: inline; } } } } Selector that triggers a cell to expand on mobile screens. *Note: this should be applied dynamically when the .smart-table–expand button is clicked Author: James Stanger Example njk {% set isExpanded = true %} {% include 'smart-table.njk' %} html compiled
name age isEmployee
Name: James Age: 24 Employee: true
Name: Jenna Age: 23 Employee: false
Requires $break-med (Number) $theme-black (Color)

smart-tabs.html.title: smart-tabs
smart-tabs.html.contents:
.smart-tabs scss .smart-tabs { display: flex; flex-direction: column; } Defines a container for a tabbed content area *NOTE: The smart-tabs element associates the first tab, item, and action as a group. Similarly it will associate the second tab, item and action as a group and so on. This is done via JavaScript. Author: James Stanger Examples njk {% include 'smart-tabs.njk' %} html compiled
  • Technician Certification History
  • Technician Action History

Name: James Age: 24 Employee: true
Name: Jenna Age: 23 Employee: false

Name: Jenna Age: 23 Employee: false
njk {% set secondTab = true %} {% include 'smart-tabs.njk' %} html compiled

Name: James Age: 24 Employee: true

Name: James Age: 24 Employee: true
Name: Jenna Age: 23 Employee: false
.smart-tabs--nav scss .smart-tabs--nav { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; } Defines navigation container for the tabs and action Author: James Stanger Example html
  • Technician Certification History
  • Technician Action History
Add Add
.smart-tabs--tabList scss .smart-tabs--tabList { display: flex; list-style: none; margin: 0; padding: 0; @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { flex-direction: column; margin-bottom: 10px; border: 1px solid black; border-radius: 5px; } } Defines list that contains the actual tabs Author: James Stanger Example html
  • Technician Certification History
  • Technician Action History
Requires $break-med (Number) .smart-tabs--tab scss .smart-tabs--tab { padding: 10px 40px; margin-right: 3px; background: lighten($theme-generic, 10%); border-radius: 5px 5px 0 0; &:hover { background: lighten($theme-generic, 5%); cursor: pointer; } @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { border-radius: 0; margin-right: 0; &:first-child { border-radius: 5px 5px 0 0; } &:last-child { border-radius: 0 0 5px 5px; } } } Styles a single tab Author: James Stanger Example html
  • Technician Certification History
    • Requires $theme-generic (Color) $break-med (Number) .smart-tabs--action scss .smart-tabs--action { display: none; align-self: center; margin: 5px; @media screen and (max-width: $break-med) { align-self: start; } } Styles an action button to be placed in the navigation Author: James Stanger Example markup Add Requires $break-med (Number) .smart-tabs--content scss .smart-tabs--content { /* Flex available content on all browsers */ flex: 1 0 auto; padding: 20px; background: $theme-generic; } Defines a container that will hold the content of the tabbed item Author: James Stanger Example markup
    ...
    Requires $theme-generic (Color) .smart-tabs--item scss .smart-tabs--item { display: none; } Defines container for an item associated with a corresponding tab. Author: James Stanger Example markup
    ...
    .smart-tabs--activeItem, .smart-tabs--activeAction scss .smart-tabs--activeItem, .smart-tabs--activeAction { display: block; } Sets styles for an active item and action Author: James Stanger Example markup
    ...
    ... .smart-tabs--activeTab scss .smart-tabs--activeTab { background: $theme-generic; &:hover { /* Ensure active tab stays the same color on hover */ background: $theme-generic; } } Sets styles for an active tab Author: James Stanger Example markup
  • ...
    • Requires $theme-generic (Color)

variables.html.title: variables
variables.html.contents: $break-xs (Number) scss $break-xs: 480px; Smallest break Author: James Stanger Used By .bit-input .smart-details--detail $break-sml (Number) scss $break-sml: 520px; Small break Author: James Stanger Used By .smart-details--headerLayout $break-med (Number) scss $break-med: 768px; Medium break Author: James Stanger Used By .block-navList--list .block-navList--item .block-navList--expand .smart-details--listContainer .smart-nav .smart-nav--headerMain .smart-nav--headerAside .smart-nav--logo .smart-nav--list .smart-nav--userTime .smart-search--title .smart-table--heading .smart-table--row .smart-table--cell .smart-table--expand .record-is-expanded .smart-tabs--tabList .smart-tabs--tab .smart-tabs--action $break-lrg (Number) scss $break-lrg: 1024px; Large break Author: James Stanger $level-0 (Number) scss $level-0: -1; Smallest Z-index level Author: James Stanger $level-1 (Number) scss $level-1: 10; Z-index level 1 Author: James Stanger $level-2 (Number) scss $level-2: 20; Z-index level 2 Author: James Stanger $level-3 (Number) scss $level-3: 30; Z-index level 3 Author: James Stanger $level-4 (Number) scss $level-4: 40; Z-index level 4 Author: James Stanger $level-5 (Number) scss $level-5: 50; Z-index level 5 Author: James Stanger $level-6 (Number) scss $level-6: 60; Z-index level 6 Author: James Stanger $level-7 (Number) scss $level-7: 70; Z-index level 7 Author: James Stanger $level-8 (Number) scss $level-8: 80; Z-index level 8 Author: James Stanger $level-9 (Number) scss $level-9: 90; Z-index level 9 Author: James Stanger Used By .bit-dropList .block-navList--list $level-100 (Number) scss $level-100: 999; Top Z-index level Author: James Stanger Used By .smart-modal
